posts.post_content:
Inventory clearance

All remaining PSA 2 and 2.5 Ramly's for one price. Payment by check, money order or Paypal (add 3%) - Please contact by email (Scott@T206TheMonster.com)

link to scans of individual cards: [url]http://t206themonster.com/Page-T204-Ramly.html[/url]
